name: Present Sorting Game
description:
Santa's factory has malfunctioned and the presents are no longer being sorted automatically! Can you guide the direction of the conveyor belts so the presents are deposited in the correctly coloured bag? 

This project was developed in processing, a java-based language, as part of a university project. It is built upon a modular level system, parsing level data from easy-to-construct 2D arrays which aided my level creation. 

Although only facilitating a simple 'rotate conveyor' interaction, future development would involve new interactions and increased level difficulty.
